name: Calculus
subtitle: An Introduction to Calculus
author: Kris Yotam
subject: Calculus
description: A fundamental workbook covering concepts in calculus, including limits, differentiation, and integration.

name: Algebra
subtitle: Mastering Algebraic Techniques
author: Kris Yotam
subject: Algebra
description: A comprehensive guide to algebra, covering fundamental operations, equations, and advanced algebraic structures.

name: Geometry
subtitle: Exploring Shapes and Spaces
author: Kris Yotam
subject: Geometry
description: A detailed workbook on geometric principles, including theorems, proofs, and real-world applications.

name: Precalculus
subtitle: Exploring Functions and Limits
author: Kris Yotam
subject: Precalculus
description: A focused guide to key precalculus concepts, including functions, algebra, and limits, to prepare for calculus.
